title: iogsport
author: iogsport
content: IOGSPORT is the biggest and most trusted platform with a comprehensive game selection, best security standards and highly responsive customer service with 24 hours per day  Link for register: https://iogsport.com/

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: With a site that looks like yours, I seriously doubt your claim to be "the biggest and most trusted platform."  When it comes to gambling, presentation is everything. No one wants to play a boring game or use a dull website, and if you want them to keep coming back for more chances of winning money, you need to make your site engaging and fun. If you can't do this, you won't be able to compete with other games and sites in the industry, and people will start looking elsewhere for their entertainment, and you'll lose out on lucrative opportunities. Gambling is, at its core, entertainment. And like all entertainment industries, the one that's most likely to succeed is the one who can produce the fun and exciting content viewers want. It's no different in online gambling. If you want to achieve your long-term goals of success, then create the best overall product you can, a product people will come back time and time again to play.

If you want to achieve your long-term goals of success, then create the best overall product you can, a product people will come back time and time again to play."Hey guys, come check out my site"Posts in a language that most won't be able to understandAnd website in an IP address? Come on now...

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Doesn't have the chance to make it big, the website seem to be created purely by a dreamweaver. There isn't even a link to turn it into English. If this is a big and trusted sportsbetting in Indonesia, it wouldn't be introduced this way in the forum or at least they will layout an ANN thread with infographics on it. This however is just being spammed. Welcome to bitcointalk anyway.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Let's say a visitor of yours is understanding and translate it into English with the browser that he has. But hovering on those links, I'm not sure if it's already been made properly or it's still a work in progress.Like for the list, I'm not a web developer but it seems like it's a local direct made by the developer. You can't just launch it like this and you need to polish everything. It's like a project for web development subject and not yet ready to commit business operations, that's what I think it is.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: The iogsport website itself is more like just a presentation or a review of an online casino located at //13.215.66.74:30000 I didn't understand why it was so complicated, especially since it looks somehow depressing, I didn't even find where to get acquainted with your ToS, which is a bit strange.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Maybe OP is trying to post this in Indonesia local board, there’s no option to change the language and seriously the site it looking not professional. I doubt that this is the most trusted platform in the world of gambling, this is very confusing honestly. This is a gambling site, and since you introduce this in public around the world, better to adopt other languages as well and better to update OP with a more comprehensive highlights for that site.

comments.author: jcojci
comments.body: Can you explain this, @OP?I do not think it is a good idea still to visit the site with a warning from that image. I hope @OP can fix this first before something bad happens to us.

comments.author: fathafraink
comments.body: Quote from: iogsport on August 29, 2022, 09:57:51 AMIOGSPORT is the biggest and most trusted platform with a comprehensive game selection, best security standards and highly responsive customer service with 24 hours per day  Link for register: https://iogsport.com/Recently there has been the arrest of a police officer in Indonesia who has ties to a gambling site company, which is what this situation really scares people to play with. And please note that gambling in Indonesia does not yet have a legal status that legalizes it. So how do you (the company) convince people to play? especially for the Indonesians themselves.

comments.author: samuraijin
comments.body: Quote from: iogsport on August 29, 2022, 09:57:51 AMIOGSPORT is the biggest and most trusted platform with a comprehensive game selection, best security standards and highly responsive customer service with 24 hours per day  Link for register: https://iogsport.com/I'm Indonesian. I think at this time gambling sites are not very safe because there are many cases of gambling sites being closed and owners being arrested by the police in Indonesia, so it's vulnerable to transact between banks there. I will avoid this because I'm more interested in using crypto to play on gambling sites. , I just visited and read information about your gambling site

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: iogsport on August 29, 2022, 09:57:51 AMIOGSPORT is the biggest and most trusted platform with a comprehensive game selection, best security standards and highly responsive customer service with 24 hours per day  Link for register: https://iogsport.com/I don't know how to interpret this website as there is no way to translate this into English, having seen a lot of casinos and how these casinos served the gambling community in the industry I don't think I can categorize it as the biggest and most trusted casino, maybe in Indonesia, I doubt it can compete against Stake, Duelbits and even a small or newly launched casinos in terms of features and design, they are already five e years in existence but they have not marketed their casinos to the English speaking gambling community.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: As other players/users have commented the site itself can be accessible by mobile using IP address and there is no way to translate it... I am not able to understand if I can use bitcoin or other ctypocurrencies. Does this site accept It? Their are allowing only indonesian hence KYC forced for all players?Any indonesian player able to confirm? If not this site is completely off topic here into this section ....

If not this site is completely off topic here into this section ....I'm not from Indonesia, but based on the contents, it's mainly promoting itself as an agent for high RTP slots from casinos. I don't see anything crypto, so far they support bank transfers, mobile reload cards and e-Wallets as reload options.Ultimately, it's all about the affiliate commission.

And please note that gambling in Indonesia does not yet have a legal status that legalizes it. I won't be surprised if there are too many illegal gambling site operating in Indonesia because they have a potential country with loyal customers.Quote from: coin-investor on October 01, 2022, 12:57:02 PMI don't know how to interpret this website as there is no way to translate this into English, having seen a lot of casinos and how these casinos served the gambling community in the industry I don't think I can categorize it as the biggest and most trusted casino, maybe in Indonesia, I doubt it can compete against Stake, Duelbits and even a small or newly launched casinos in terms of features and design, they are already five e years in existence but they have not marketed their casinos to the English speaking gambling community.They are not quite enough to operate. On the desktop version, they also don't make a choice of language. I know we can auto-translate to English with right-click, but sometimes I find several languages is not translated to English. And, I think this site is not for the outside countries from Indonesia, because we need an Indonesia Bank Account to deposit. This site hasn't been licensed.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: I also did not find an opportunity to make crypto payments to the casino, for deposits only the possibility of replenishment from the accounts of the following five banks: https://13.215.66.74:30000/id-ID/Help/Payment1.Bank Central Asia (BCA)2.Bank Mandiri3.Bank Negara Indonesia (BNI)4.Bank Rakyat Indonesia (BRI)5.Bank Danamon

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: iogsport on August 29, 2022, 09:57:51 AMIOGSPORT is the biggest and most trusted platform with a comprehensive game selection, best security standards and highly responsive customer service with 24 hours per day  Link for register: https://iogsport.com/We'll see in two days what is OP's intention of posting here and if he will be active in promoting his casino review which is limited to whom he can refer, because of the language barrier, or if he just post this here for the sake of link building, Bitcointalk as being the number one forum with online casinos section, if the later is his intention then better lock this thread as he already created an announcement here as he will no longer be active here.

comments.author: the rise
comments.body: I can not access your web page, why is that? do i have to use a vpn to open it, besides that please make more complete information it will be better than just making an ANN at a glance
